column5: well since i don't post many reports these days, heres a few steelies that i caught in the eastern tribs mid June. They took my pink worms really early in the morning as the sun rose, but as soon as the sun was bright enough for them to see me or any movement, they would stop biting.     took this little guy home for a meal   no more tribs fishing for me, its kayak/canoe fishing time now!
Nice fish!  Good to see summer STEEL.  Can't wait till the fall.
Nice fish Rico, now get back in your kayak
